notes.template: Do you care that I have ${4}?
Actually, I look like a monster from a scary movie

That is funny, I wear a mask sometimes too.  But, mine is made out of dried human ${5} and ${6} ${7} that I find in the park.  I would really like to come over and massage your ${3}.  Lets see how it goes.  I've already updated my ${2} account to say, I'm cooking popcorn with that chick who was in E T <Break time="150ms"/>  L O L.
